content:
I think there might be some confusion! You didn't mention a litter mat earlier, and I'm a large language model, I don't have any prior knowledge about your conversation or Luna's needs. I'm starting from scratch with each response.

However, if you'd like to share more about the litter mat you got for Luna, I'd be happy to help you explore whether a pet bed with a similar design or material could work well for her. Please feel free to share more details, and I'll do my best to provide helpful advice!
